page.title: HyperLathe | Front End Development
content1: With over 16 years’ industry experience, I am an accomplished front-end developer with a good knowledge of design and UX/UI. I have a strong problem-solving mindset, an eye for detail, and excellent communication skills.
page.headline2: Problem solving on both a macro and micro level
content2: HTML, CSS/SCSS, JavaScript, VueJS, React, UX/UI, wireframing, prototyping, user testing, responsive design, html emails, jQuery, WordPress, image editing, asset creation & optimising, video/audio editing.
content3: For a more comprehensive list please check out my portfolio.
